attributes.action: Create An Independent Lottery for England, Wales, Northern Ireland And Scotland To Help Fund Sport Run By Separate Companies Based And Owned In Each Country
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As there is now a Euro Lottery and a British National Lottery is it now time to have independent national lotteries for each of the UK countries that sole purpose is to raise money for local sports projects. This would maxmise the opportunities of sporting success in the next decade and leave a legacy at a local level. These could be run by charities that already distribute funds to sporting projects such as the Sports Development Foundation Scotland.
